name: BIONITE: Origins Single Player Mission Pack: Venus
blurb: The Venus Single Player Mission Pack for BIONITE. eFPS: Advanced FPS/RTS hybrid, reviving an almost forgotten genre.

rewards.reward: PRIVATE LEVEL BACKER - Be a great person and Help Us OUT!  Get a Credit as a Private Backer in the Game Credits.
CORPORAL LEVEL BACKER - Includes access to the Closed Betas of BIONITE: Origins Single Player Mission Pack: Venus. Also, your name in the Game Credits as a Corporal Backer of BIONITE: Origins.
SERGEANT LEVEL BACKER - Includes: 1. A digital copy of the Single Player Mission Pack: Venus. 2. Your name in the Game Credits as a Sergeant Backer of BIONITE: Origins.

LEUTENIENT LEVEL BACKER - Includes: 1. A digital copy of the Single Player Mission Pack: Venus. 2. A digital copy of the Limited Edition, Hi-Resolution Screensaver Pack. 3. Your name in the Game Credits as a Leutenient Backer of BIONITE: Origins.

CAPTAIN LEVEL BACKER - Includes:
1. A digital copy of the Bionite: Origins Single Player Mission Pack: Venus. 
2. A digital copy of the Limited Edition, Hi-Resolution Screensaver Pack. 
3. One Limited Edition BIONITE: Origins T-Shirt.
4. Your name in the Game Credits as a Captain Backer of BIONITE: Origins.

No cost to ship within the continental USA.

OFFICER LEVEL BACKER - Includes:
1. A digital copy of the Bionite: Origins Single Player Mission Pack: Venus. 
2. A digital copy of the Limited Edition, Hi-Resolution Screensaver Pack. 
3. One Limited Edition BIONITE: Origins Box Art Printed Poster.
4. Your name in the Game Credits as an Officer Backer of BIONITE: Origins.

No cost to ship within the continental USA.

COLONEL LEVEL BACKER - Includes:
1. A digital copy of the Bionite: Origins Single Player Mission Pack: Venus. 
2. A digital copy of the Limited Edition, Hi-Resolution Screensaver Pack. 
3. One Limited Edition BIONITE: Origins Faction Flag (IMI or Rebel).
4. Your name in the Game Credits as a Colonel Backer of BIONITE: Origins.

No cost to ship within the continental USA.

MAJOR LEVEL BACKER - Includes:
1. A digital copy of the Bionite: Origins Single Player Mission Pack: Venus. 
2. A digital copy of the Limited Edition, Hi-Resolution Screensaver Pack. 
3. One Limited Edition BIONITE: Origins Dogtag on a chain.
4. Your name in the Game Credits as an Major Backer of BIONITE: Origins.

No cost to ship within the continental USA.

LEUTENIENT GENERAL LEVEL BACKER - Includes:
1. A digital copy of the Bionite: Origins Single Player Mission Pack: Venus. 
2. A digital copy of the Limited Edition, Hi-Resolution Screensaver Pack. 
3. One Limited Edition BIONITE: Origins Patch.
4. Your name in the Game Credits as a Leutenient General Backer of BIONITE: Origins.

No cost to ship within the continental USA.

BRIGADIER GENERAL BACKER - Includes:
1. A digital copy of the Bionite: Origins Single Player Mission Pack: Venus. 
2. A digital copy of the Limited Edition, Hi-Resolution Screensaver Pack. 
3. One Limited Edition BIONITE: Origins Box Art Printed Poster.
4. One Limited Edition BIONITE: Origins T-Shirt.
5. One Limited Edition BIONITE: Origins Dogtag.
6. Two Limited Edition BIONITE: Origins Faction Flags (IMI and Rebel).
7. A Plaque in your honor made and mounted to the Memorial Wall of the Monument.
8. Your name in the Game Credits as a Brigadier General Backer of BIONITE: Origins.
